underlying_goal: To justify a choice of hyperparameter (bootstrap sample size k=10) in a paper by adding a real-world citation, and then commit the changes.
primary_success: Claude correctly understood the user's intent to justify a hyperparameter, found a suitable citation (Gemini 3 Pro model card), integrated it into the paper, updated related spec documents, and committed the work.
brief_summary: The user needed to justify the bootstrap sample size in their paper. Claude added a citation to the Gemini 3 Pro model card to justify the choice by comparing it to real-world evaluation scales. It then updated the paper and spec files, and committed and pushed the changes.
